TopicTitle: "Using memoryadresses from more that 16GB of memory"

Articles.Content:
Nevermind, there was something wrong with texturereplacer

KSP closes during start-up

Latest line in log file is "ERR 18:11:10.156] Using memoryadresses from more that 16GB of memory"

I got 8 Gb of ram.

Im using KSP 0.25 in 64-bit

Im using Linux, Ubuntu.

I got lots of mods. Lots.

You can find KSP.log here

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4sz6f1xznl9kp5r/KSP.log?dl=0

And player.log here

https://www.dropbox.com/s/46f5e6dlcz60uht/Player.log?dl=0

Edited November 9, 2014 by Shurikeeen
Wild shot in the dark: tried running outside of steam, i.e. using system libs?

I've never seen this error mentioned before. I can only suggest you follow the instructions in the "How to get support" sticky thread about how to troubleshoot, providing a complete list of mods and a complete player.log file (it has more useful info in it than KSP.log).

I've never seen this error mentioned before. I can only suggest you follow the instructions in the "How to get support" sticky thread about how to troubleshoot, providing a complete list of mods and a complete player.log file (it has more useful info in it than KSP.log).

Here is the player.log file for the moment

https://www.dropbox.com/s/46f5e6dlcz60uht/Player.log?dl=0
This thread is marked as solved, but I don't see your solution here. I'm having the same problem. What did you do to fix it?

This thread is marked as solved, but I don't see your solution here. I'm having the same problem. What did you do to fix it?

I reinstalled texturereplacer
Ok, thanks for taking the time to reply to my super late question
